mapper.select: SELECT ACBG_SN ,ACBG_SE_CD ,SCHL_NM ,MAJOR_INTLTSH_NM ,GRDTN_STTS_CD ,PNT_PSCORE_SE_CD ,SCRE AS SCRE ,MTCLTN_YR ,GRDTN_YR FROM EMP_ACBG WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
SELECT FGGG_ABLTY_SN, FGGG_KND_CD, PICTRS_LEVEL_CD, ATHRI_TEST_NM , SCORE FROM EMP_FGGG_ABLTY WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
SELECT QLFC_LCNS_SN, QLFC_LCNS_NM , QLFC_LCNS_ID , GRAD_NM , ACQS_YMD FROM EMP_QLFC_LCNS WHERE EMP_ID= #{empId}
SELECT EDU_SN, EDU_INST_NM, EDU_NM, EDU_BGNG_YMD, EDU_END_YMD, EDU_CN FROM EMP_EDU WHERE EMP_ID= #{empId}
SELECT CAREER_SN, WORK_BGNG_YMD, WORK_END_YMD, WRKPLC_NM, MAIN_CAREER_CN, LCTN_ADDR, RM FROM EMP_CAREER WHERE EMP_ID= #{empId}
SELECT PRJCT_HIST_SN , PRJCT_NM , PRJCT_BGNG_YMD, PRJCT_END_YMD, TKCG_JOB_CN, ORDER_INST_NM, JOB_CL_CD, TCHNLGY_CL_CD, RM FROM EMP_PRJCT_HIST WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROWNUM , NOTICE_ID , NOTICE_TTL , SGNAL_ORDR , e.EMP_FLNM AS REG_EMP_ID , DATE_FORMAT(n.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT , COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_ITEMS FROM NOTICE n LEFT JOIN EMP e ON n.REG_EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID WHERE 1=1
AND SGNAL_ORDR IN (0, 1)
AND SGNAL_ORDR IN (2, 3)
AND NOTICE_TTL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(NOTICE_CN, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND ( NOTICE_TTL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(NOTICE_CN, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%') )
ORDER BY CASE WHEN SGNAL_ORDR IN (1, 3) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, REG_DT DESC

SELECT NOTICE_ID , NOTICE_TTL , NOTICE_CN , SGNAL_ORDR , USE_YN , IMPRTNC_NTC_BGNG_YMD , IMPRTNC_NTC_END_YMD , USE_END_YMD , n.ATCHMNFL_ID , a.ATCHMNFL_SN , a.REAL_FILE_NM , a.STRG_FILE_NM , e.EMP_FLNM AS REG_EMP_NM , n.REG_EMP_ID , DATE_FORMAT(n.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT FROM NOTICE n LEFT JOIN EMP e ON n.REG_EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN ATCHMNFL a ON n.ATCHMNFL_ID = a.ATCHMNFL_ID WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
SELECT A.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, B.DEPT_ID AS DEPT_ID FROM DEPT A INNER JOIN DEPT_HNF B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID
SELECT D.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, EMP_FLNM , TELNO, EML, BRDT FROM EMP E LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT_HNF DH ON DH.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT D ON D.DEPT_ID = DH.DEPT_ID WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM EMP_DTL WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
